page.title: 04Chickerell Primary School.
page.content: This{Victorian building}stands at the junction of{East Street and Putton {Lane.}It was built 11O years ago.It has{7 classrooms,approx' 19O pupils and{7 teachers,}secretary,one ancillary,one caretaker,one cleaning asssistant and{the headmaster.}The main building houses{2 classrooms,Hall {,library, headmaster's office, {secretary's office,kitchen,staffroom, storerooms.There are{5 mobile {classrooms}and the{canteen}in the playground.The school has two gates, one for pedestrians the other for vehicles.The{car park}at the front is used for{staff,visitors and bicycles. There are 2 small playgrounds and a playing field.The canteen is now used only by children who bring sandwiches to school.They are supervised by{4 {lunch-time supervisory staff.
